overview: Love Don't Fade Away is a story of Love, Loss and the meaning of Life. A man, Raymond Vaughn, struggling to find peace of mind amidst the crushing pressures of financial insecurity and self-doubt. Feeling he is letting down himself and his beautiful wife, Cindy, who still loves him unconditionally, Raymond's pursuit of life's true meaning takes an unexpected turn. Raymond's serendipitous "discovery" challenges him to contemplate what matters most in this life... and beyond.
title: Love Don’t Fade Away
